submapp.hmm.Hmm.__init__¶

Hmm.__init__(n_obs: int, n_dis: int, name: str = 'MyHMM')¶

Class constructor

Parameters

  • n_obs (int) – Total number of observable classes

  • n_dis (int) – Total number of hidden classes

  • name (str, optional) – The Name of the Hmm object. This name has no impact on the variable name, however it can be usefull when it comes to saving the Hmm object and its related figures, defaults to “MyHmm”
